title: Mike Malloy Show - June 08 2010
description:
According to the New York Times, at least one scientist believes that the oil geyser is gushing at a greater volume since BP cut off the top of the riser last week.   Dr. Ira Leifer is an expert hired by the government to estimate the rate of the oil flow.
